contentrichtext.text: {{Europe-stub}} {{Infobox Province Spain | name = Córdoba | native_name = | image_skyline = | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_flag = Provincia de Córdoba - Bandera.svg | image_shield = Provincia de Córdoba - Escudo.svg | motto = | anthem = | image_map = Cordoba in Spain.svg | latd = 38|latm = 00|latNS = N | longd = 4|longm = 50|longEW = W | coordinates_type = region:ES_type:adm2nd_source:GNS-enwiki | autonomous_community = [[Andalusia]] | capital = [[Córdoba, Spain|Córdoba]] | government_type = Diputación de Córdoba | president = [[Francisco Pulido Muñoz]] | president_party = | area_total_km2 = 13769 | area_rank = 13th | area_percent = 2.73 | elevation_m = | language = [[Spanish language|Spanish]] | population_total = 803038 | population_as_of = 2009 | population_rank = 18th | population_demonym = English: Cordovan<br />{{lang-es|Cordobés}} | population_percent = 1.78 | website = [http://www.dipucordoba.es/ dipucordoba.es] }} '''Córdoba''' ({{IPA-es|ˈkorðoβa}}), also called '''Cordova''' in [[English language|English]],<ref>''[[Encyclopædia Britannica]]'', [http://www.britannica.com/EBchecked/topic/137373/Cordoba Córdoba (conventional Cordova)]</ref> is a [[Provinces of Spain|province]] of southern [[Spain]], in the north-central part of the [[Autonomous communities of Spain|autonomous community]] of [[Andalusia]]. It is bordered by the provinces of [[Málaga (province)|Málaga]], [[Seville (province)|Seville]], [[Badajoz (province)|Badajoz]], [[Ciudad Real (province)|Ciudad Real]], [[Jaén Province, Spain|Jaén]], and [[Granada (province)|Granada]]. Its area is 13,769 km². Its population is 803,038 (2009), of whom more than 40% live in the capital, [[Córdoba, Spain|Córdoba]], and its population density is 56.00/km². The province of Córdoba contains [[List of municipalities in Córdoba|75 municipalities]]. ==Comarcas== * [[Alto Guadalquivir]] * [[Campiña Este - Guadajoz]] * [[Campiña Sur (Córdoba)|Campiña Sur]] * [[Subbetica]] * [[Valle de los Pedroches]] * [[Valle del Guadiato]] * [[Vega del Guadalquivir]] == See also == * [[List of municipalities in Córdoba]] * [[Seville]] * [[Cordoba_cathedral|Cordoba Cathedral]] ==References== {{reflist}} == External links == *{{es icon}}[http://www.juntadeandalucia.es/medioambiente/servtc5/ventana/mostrarFicha.do?idEspacio=7412 Sierra de Cardeña y Montoro Natural Park] *{{es icon}}[http://www.juntadeandalucia.es/medioambiente/servtc5/ventana/mostrarFicha.do?idEspacio=7413 Sierra de Hornachuelos Natural Park] *{{es icon}}[http://www.juntadeandalucia.es/medioambiente/servtc5/ventana/mostrarFicha.do?idEspacio=7414 Sierras Subbéticas Natural Park] *{{en icon}}[http://www.andalusia-travel.com/165/Cordoba_province.html Travel Guide to Cordoba Province] *{{es icon}}[http://www.cordobainterculturalidad.com/prologos/4-francisco-pulido-munoz.html Page About Francisco Munoz] {{Andalusian provinces}} {{Provinces of Spain}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Cordoba, Province of}} [[Category:Province of Córdoba (Spain)| ]] {{andalusia-geo-stub}}
